M

main(String[]) - Static method in class client.SecureChat
Launch the SecureChat Application.
Message - Class in common
Message class define structure of message.
Message(byte, byte, String, String, byte[]) - Constructor for class common.Message
Create the message object.
MessageBytes - Class in common
The class is used to convert message object payload from many messages to one payload message as one byte array.
MessageBytes(byte[]) - Constructor for class common.MessageBytes
Creates new message payload.
MessageReceiver - Class in client
The class is responsible for the processing of received messages.
MessageReceiver(ClientController, MessageSender) - Constructor for class client.MessageReceiver
The controller creates the message receiver thread.
MessageSender - Class in client
The class is responsible for the preparation and transfer of the message objects.
MessageSender(ClientController) - Constructor for class client.MessageSender
The controller creates the message sender thread.
modPowByte(byte[], BigInteger, BigInteger) - Static method in class common.Utilities
Calculates the modular exponent.
MY_MSG - Static variable in class client.ClientController
